page.title: 15HISTORICAL WICKWAR (3)
page.content: IN THE 18th.CENTURY WERE ALSO IMPORTANT MEANS OF EMPLOYMENT IN WICKWAR.A STUDY OF THIS WAS MADE BY "WEST COUNTRY BREWERY,1960".AT THE FAR END OF THE VILLAGE IS THE "ENDOWED SCHOOL",FOUNDED BY ALEXANDER HOSEA'S BEQUEST IN 1684.ORIGINALLY A SCHOOL FOR 30POOR BOYS OF WICKWAR IT IS NOW A C.P.SCHOOL.THERE HAVE BEEN SEVERAL SCHOOLS IN WICKWAR;A GIRLS SCHOOL,AND AN INFANTS SCHOOL.BOTH NO LONGER EXIST BUT THE BUILDINGS ARE USED FOR OTHER PURPOSES.WITH AN AREA SCHEDULED FOR DEVELOPMENT WITHIN THE VILLAGE A NEW SCHOOL SITE HAS BEEN ALLOCATED, WHETHER THIS SITE WILL BE USED AND DEVELOPED DEPENDS ON THE GROWTH OF THE VILLAGE.
